name: easyconf
description: A configuration utility like nconf, for node and browser

scripts.test: export FOO_API_KEY=27A13 && export BAR_API_KEY=A312 && mocha --debug --check-leaks --require tests/init.js lib/*.spec.js tests/*.spec.js
scripts.testsingle: export FOO_API_KEY=27A13 && export BAR_API_KEY=A312 && mocha --debug --check-leaks --require tests/init.js lib/store.spec.js

author: Offirmo <offirmo.net@gmail.com>
